page.title: 20WALKS ctd.
page.content:
You park at Pitsford Hill. The roads are quite narrow here, so it is a good idea to make sure your minibus isn't blocking the way.
Walk north-east towards Gaulden Manor. You come out close to the manor and turn right and right again up narrow, winding roads. It is a good idea to send someone on ahead and have someone at the back of the party, otherwise there could be an accident. The road eventually takes you back to Pitsford Hill. If you are VERY lucky, the shop at Pitsford Hill might be open..
